Returns: The status code of the submit score operation.
getStatusCode().Description: Retrieve the status code of the submit score operation. This will be one of the following values: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_OK_E@ if the operation succeeded. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_OPERATION_DEFERRED_E@ if the operation could not be completed at this time. The operation will be cached and retried again later. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_OPERATION_FAILED_E@ if the operation encountered a non-recoverable network error. In this case, the operation will not be retried.

Returns: The appropriate @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#SubmitScoreResult#Result_E@ or null if no result was returned for the given time span.
Parameters: Time span to retrieve result for. Valid values are @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_DAILY_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_WEEKLY_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#LeaderboardVariant#TIME_SPAN_ALL_TIME_E@.
getScoreResult(int).Description: Retrieves the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#leaderboard#SubmitScoreResult#Result_E@ object for the given time span, if any.

getPlayerId().Description: Retrieves the ID of the player the score was submitted for.

getLeaderboardId().Description: Retrieves the ID of the leaderboard the score was submitted to.

SubmitScoreResult(int, java.lang.String,.FullName: public SubmitScoreResult (int statusCode, String leaderboardId, String playerId)

Parameters: The status code (from @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient_E@) to report to the client.
The leaderboard ID the score was submitted to.
The player whose score was submitted.
A map from timespan to result for that timespan.
SubmitScoreResult(int, java.lang.String,.Description: Construct a new result describing a SubmitScore operation.

ClassDesc: Data object representing the result of submitting a score to a leaderboard.
